verbose_text: It has been demonstrated that dopamine treatment in human SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells may cause a DJ-1 " isoform shift " toward more acidic pIs XREF_BIBR, raising the possibility that HNE modified DJ-1 in our study could be influenced by dopamine treatment of PD patients.
evidence: dopamine treatment in human SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells may cause a DJ-1
